attributes.action: ensure BRITISH HISTORY is taught in schools
attributes.additional_details:
people cannot forget that our history happened. children in both primary and secondary shcools should know about our proud history and what a great nation we once were. we in great britain are loosing our identity when it was once most recognisable. Teaching english history will improve patrism and perhaps encourage people to do there best. people should strive for the nation we once had and learning about our history will help them realize. this isn't asking for anything discriminative, it's just asking us to be british again.

we must remember that most children today don't know the national anthem nor the lords prayer.
